name: Elections Commission - P. J. Perera of the Kotikawatta, Mulleriyawa Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of the United National Party - I. R. M. Gamage of the Kotikawatta Mulleriyawa Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated her office of the member of the United National Party - T. N. Naanthota of the Homagama Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of the member of United National Party
